question: What is the main purpose of conducting the Chandan Jatra ritual during the Jyestha month?
option1: Providing pleasant cool comfort during summer
option2: Providing natural meditation to get rid of illness
option3: Providing Chandan tree to each and every devotees
explanation: Chandan Jatra is celebrated in the month of May-June. The main purpose of conducting the Chandan Jatra ritual during the Jyestha month is to provide pleasant cool comfort during summer to Lord Jagannath.
